SELECT no, ${name} AS name, ${photo} AS photo FROM ${table} WHERE ${name}||' '||NVL(info,' ')||' '||NVL(addr1,' ')||' '||NVL(addr2,' ') LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND rownum < 5
SELECT tagcode, tagname FROM hashtagtable WHERE tagname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND rownum < 5

SELECT type, no FROM (SELECT type, no, tagcode, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag GROUP BY type, no, tagcode ORDER BY cnt DESC) NATURAL JOIN hashtagtable WHERE tagname LIKE #{keyword}||'%' AND cnt > 3 AND rownum < 5
